programme.title: الحصاد
programme.desc: الحصاد هو استوديو صغير من beIN Sports News ينظر إلى القصص التي احتلت العناوين الرئيسية في عالم الرياضة وتلك القصص التي ستحتل العناوين الرئيسية صباح الغد.

programme.title: نشرة الأخبار - Live Studio @02:00
programme.desc: آخر الأخبار من غرفة أخبار beIn SPORTS، ومعاينة ومراجعة التطورات والدرجات بمساهمة من جميع أنحاء العالم من مراسلي beIN.

programme.title: فلسطين، جيرسي واحد، جذور كثيرة
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.title: تعادل دور المجموعات بين الأندية CAF لدوري أبطال أفريقيا TotalEnergies و TotalEnergies CAF
programme.desc: The draw for the 2025/26 TotalEnergies CAF Champions League and TotalEnergies CAF Confederation Cup Group stage is set to take place on Monday, 03 November 2025. The Group Stages of the TotalEnergies CAF Champions League will showcase the top Clubs from across the continent. The 16 clubs competing in the Group Stages will be divided into four groups of four during the official draw in Johannesburg. The 16 clubs advancing to the 2025/26 TotalEnergies CAF Confederation Cup group stage comprise a mix of continental powerhouses, former champions, and enthusiastic newcomers, promising an exciting draw in Johannesburg.

programme.title: UCL Magazine 2025/2026 - MD4 Preview
programme.desc: ملخص لأفضل ما في اللعبة، بالإضافة إلى التطلع إلى يوم المباراة التالي في مسابقة كرة القدم الأوروبية الممتازة، دوري أبطال أوروبا UEFA. ستكون دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 هي الثانية التي ستلعب في إطار مرحلة الدوري الجديد المكون من 36 فريقًا. جميع المباريات من دوري أبطال أوروبا مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN مع اختيار التعليق العربي أو الإنجليزي.

programme.title: الملخص 1 - 2/11/25

programme.title: نشرة لغة الإشارة @20:00
programme.desc: نشرة إخبارية خاصة من غرفة أخبار beIN SPORTS مع إضافة لغة الإشارة لضعاف السمع.

programme.title: فلسطين، جيرسي واحد، جذور كثيرة
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.title: نشرة الساعة التاسعة - أخبار
programme.desc: آخر الأخبار من غرفة أخبار beIn SPORTS، ومعاينة ومراجعة التطورات والدرجات بمساهمة من جميع أنحاء العالم من مراسلي beIN.

programme.title: نشرة كأس العالم FIFA تحت 17 سنة قطر 2025 - @22:00
programme.desc: نشرة خاصة تغطي جميع الأخبار حول كأس العالم تحت 17 سنة قطر 2025 FIFA، والتي ستشهد مشاركة 48 فريقًا، بما في ذلك ستة فرق عربية: قطر والمملكة العربية السعودية والإمارات العربية المتحدة والمغرب وتونس ومصر. كأس العالم FIFA تحت 17 سنة قطر 2025 هي الأولى من خمس نسخ متتالية ستستضيفها قطر.

programme.title: مونبلييه ضد نانت - LNH القسم 1 - كرة اليد الفرنسية Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Al Sadd vs Al Rayyan - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W9
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

It is worth noting that the total prize money for this round was two million dollars.

History of the Asian Games
programme.desc: From its beginnings to today, the Asian Games torch lighting has become a dazzling showcase of creativity and technology. Each edition brings fresh innovation, with Doha 2006’s unforgettable horse-and-rider moment still hailed as a highlight. As the 2026 Games in Japan draw near, excitement builds over what new spectacle will capture the world’s imagination.

Alejandra SALAZAR BENGOECHEA ESP Martina CALVO ESP vs Ustero Prieto/Araujo OR Sanchez Fallada/Josema
programme.desc: Premier Padel New Giza 2025, a P2 category event, takes place from 27 October to 1 November at the NewGiza Sports Club in Egypt. Featuring men’s and women’s draws of 32 pairs, the tournament begins with qualification rounds on 27–28 October. With €250,000 in prize money at stake, this prestigious stop on the Premier Padel tour brings world-class competition to the iconic backdrop of Giza, showcasing top talent in a vibrant setting.

programme.title: M1- Rolex Paris Masters - Paris - 2025

programme.title: فلسطين، جيرسي واحد، جذور كثيرة
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. programme.title: Marc Márquez: More than a Comeback
programme.desc: After 2,184 days, 108 crashes, six surgeries and 30 missed Grands Prix, Marc Marquez has once again claimed the MotoGP World Championship title, doing so for an astonishing seventh time. But it’s been more than a comeback for the Spanish rider, who has endured his own personal calvary over the past six years. Through exclusive interviews with Marc, his friends and family, and never-before-seen footage, this 30-minute documentary provides previously unheard perspectives on the highs and lows of the Spaniard’s arduous journey back to the top of Grand Prix motorcycle racing

programme.title: فلسطين، جيرسي واحد، جذور كثيرة
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.title: تعادل دور المجموعات بين الأندية CAF لدوري أبطال أفريقيا TotalEnergies و TotalEnergies CAF
programme.desc: The draw for the 2025/26 TotalEnergies CAF Champions League and TotalEnergies CAF Confederation Cup Group stage is set to take place on Monday, 03 November 2025. The Group Stages of the TotalEnergies CAF Champions League will showcase the top Clubs from across the continent. The 16 clubs competing in the Group Stages will be divided into four groups of four during the official draw in Johannesburg. The 16 clubs advancing to the 2025/26 TotalEnergies CAF Confederation Cup group stage comprise a mix of continental powerhouses, former champions, and enthusiastic newcomers, promising an exciting draw in Johannesburg.

programme.title: فلسطين، جيرسي واحد، جذور كثيرة
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.title: مونبلييه ضد نانت - LNH القسم 1 - كرة اليد الفرنسية Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Al Sadd vs Al Rayyan - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W9
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Tremblay vs Aix - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue

programme.desc: Live and exclusive coverage from South America of the Copa Sudamericana. The competition began in 2002, replacing the separate competitions Copa Merconorte and Copa Mercosur. Since it started, the Copa Sudamericana has been a pure elimination tournament with the number of rounds and teams varying from year to year. Argentine clubs have accumulated the most victories with ten while containing the largest number of different winning teams, with eights clubs having won the title. programme.title: فلسطين، جيرسي واحد، جذور كثيرة
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.title: Marc Márquez: More than a Comeback
programme.desc: After 2,184 days, 108 crashes, six surgeries and 30 missed Grands Prix, Marc Marquez has once again claimed the MotoGP World Championship title, doing so for an astonishing seventh time. But it’s been more than a comeback for the Spanish rider, who has endured his own personal calvary over the past six years. Through exclusive interviews with Marc, his friends and family, and never-before-seen footage, this 30-minute documentary provides previously unheard perspectives on the highs and lows of the Spaniard’s arduous journey back to the top of Grand Prix motorcycle racing
